description: Create, update, and delete short links effortlessly with this server. Integrate seamlessly with AI assistants to manage your Dub.co links through a standardized interface. Enhance your link management experience with powerful tools at your fingertips.

dubcoApiKey.description: Your Dub.co API key, obtainable from the Dub.co dashboard.

tools.name: create_link
tools.description: Create a new short link on dub.co, asking the user which domain to use

key.description: Optional custom slug for the short link. If not provided, a random slug will be generated.

domain.description: Optional domain slug to use. If not provided, the primary domain will be used.

externalId.description: Optional external ID for the link

tools.name: update_link
tools.description: Update an existing short link on dub.co

key.description: The new slug for the short link

domain.description: The new domain for the short link

linkId.description: The ID of the link to update

tools.name: delete_link
tools.description: Delete a short link on dub.co

linkId.description: The ID of the link to delete
